title: Steelers QB Ben Roethlisberger Loses Multiple Fingers in 4th of July Firework Accident?
subtitle: Reports that Pittsburgh quarterback Ben Roethlisberger lost several fingers in a 4th of July fireworks accident are fake news.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger lost several fingers in a fireworks accident on 4 July 2017.
